---
title: "CompletionAction"
description: "Complete the task by returning the answer and terminate the browser session"
---



**Example:**
```python
from notte_sdk import actions

session.execute(actions.Completion(success=True, answer="Task completed successfully"))
session.execute(actions.Completion(success=False, answer="Could not complete task"))
```

## Fields

<ParamField path="type" type="Literal['completion']" default="completion">
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="category" type="str" default="Special Browser Actions">
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="description" type="str" default="Complete the task by returning the answer and terminate the browser session">
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="success" type="bool" required>
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="answer" type="str" required>
</ParamField>


## Module

`notte_core.actions`
